citation: Proclamation under the Police Service (Consequential Amendments) Act 2003 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Police Service (Consequential Amendments) Act 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Police Service (Consequential Amendments) Act 2003 fix 1 January 2004 as the day on which that Act commences.

23 December 2003

RICHARD BUTLER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Police and Public Safety

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 31 December 2003

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Police and Public Safety.
